title: You Dare - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Contracts   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Maids   Naive Protagonist   Pregnancy   Weak Protagonist
author: 강희자매
description:
Lawrence Devitch, a young banker who dominated the Kosimo Empire.

One day, Rahee, a mixed-race girl thrown at him instead of debt.

'Please accept me as a maid .'

It was just a collateral. But.......

The girl is a lady, it began to occur a crack on his frozen heart .

'The contract should have been prudent. It was what you wanted in the first place. So don't blame me. What I see is not money, but you.'

'You want me to pay off your debts, right?'

'Yes. I want to pay you back. But I have to pay it my way, not your way. That's right.'

To hold her, he did not hesitate to use any tricks.

Dare! Do not allow her to escape.>
